column4: hey guys, when i use the VI command how do i write something and quit i know that ":q" is quit but wheni write swomething i try to do :wq or !add and it wont let me save it what is the real command?
yeah
negative, nano sucks, go with vi
yes
Steam works exceptionally well. i tried installing CS:S.. and it was horrible. just awful. i don't know about regular cs though. look into cedega instead, it's much more appropriate.
i'll grab a guide for you
sudo apt-get install linux-image-686 i think
it's somewhere here.. there's a lot of guides and what not. http://www.linux-gamers.net/
also check out #winehq on this server
there aren't 686 packages
because of running the new kernel/
what errors? send them to pastebin.
put my name before what you say, so it gets highlighted on my screen, and i don't miss your messages. type "kam" then hit "tab" and it should complete my name.
did you sudo apt-get update?
yeah i did and it worked thx
cedega is not in repos, it's a non-free program (you have to pay for it)
www.transgaming.com is the company behind cedega
i use  bitcomet and utorrent as a bt client on windows, what is a good alternative for linux so i can download my linux iso's via bt
azureus is my favorite, but it's a resource hog. other than that.. try "sudo apt-cache search torrent" for a list of other clients.
don't worry about it.
but yeah, try running cedega.. type "cedega" and enter at a command prompt. i don't think it actually needs xlibs.
i've never heard of wolfenstein for linux. but you can try "sh filename.run"
how goes it?
